cards.name: Bonesaw
cards.text: If a friendly creature was destroyed this turn, Bonesaw enters play ready.

cards.name: Brabble
cards.text: Destroyed:  Your opponent loses 1A.  If it is not your turn, your opponent loses 3A instead.

cards.name: Dark Minion
cards.text:
Enhance D.
Destroyed: Deal 1D to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Drecker
cards.text:
Damage dealt Drecker's neighbors during fights is also dealt to Drecker.
Reap: Steal 1A.

cards.name: Imp-losion
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature and an enemy creature.

cards.name: Mark of Dis
cards.text: Play: Deal 2D to a creature. If it is not destroyed, its controller must choose that creature's house as the active house on their next turn.

cards.name: Mindfire
cards.text: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand. Steal 1A for each bonus icon on the discarded card.

cards.name: Sinder
cards.text:
Taunt.

cards.name: Snarette
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, capture 1A.

cards.name: Stirring Grave

Reap: Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Waking Nightmare

Enhance Capture.
Play: Keys cost +1A for each Dis creature in play during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Break-key
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has more forged keys than you, unforge an opponent's key.  If you unforge an opponent's key this way, your opponent gains 6A.

cards.name: Double Doom
cards.text: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner's hand.  Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Essence Scale
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature.  If you do, ready and use a friendly creature that shares a house with the destroyed creature.

cards.name: Grim Reminder
cards.text: Play: Choose a house.  Archive all creatures from that house in you discard pile. Gain 1 chain.

cards.name: Hystricog
cards.text:
Enhance D D D.

cards.name: Picaroon

Deploy.

cards.name: Relentless Creeper
cards.text: After you choose Dis as your active house, you may return Relentless Creeper from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Wail of the Damned
cards.text:
Enhance Capture.

cards.name: Etan's Jar
cards.text: Play: Name a card. Until Etan's Jar leaves play, cards with that  name cannot be played.

cards.name: Maleficorn
cards.text:
Enhance D D D D.
After an enemy creature is dealt damage by a D bonus icon, deal 1D to that creature.

cards.name: Painmail

cards.name: Ritual of Tognath
cards.text: Play: Destroy 2 friendly creatures.

cards.name: Skixuno
cards.text:
Omega.
Play: Destroy each other creature.  For each creature destroyed this way, give Skixuno a +1 power counter.

cards.name: The Pale Star
cards.text: Omni: Destroy The Pale Star. For the remainder of the turn, each creature is considered to have 1 power and 0 armor.

cards.name: Turnkey
cards.text: Play: Unforge an opponent's key.  If you do, when Turnkey leaves play, your opponent forges a key at no cost.

cards.text:
Keys cost +4A.

Enhance Draw.

Enhance Capture D Draw.

cards.name: Animator
cards.text: Action: Move an artifact to a flank of its controller's battleline.  For the remainder of the turn, it is a creature with 3 power that belongs to the active house. (It leaves the battleline when it's no longer a creature.)

cards.name: Auto-Vac 5150
cards.text: Action: You may discard a card from your archives. If you do, keys cost +3A during your opponent's next turn. Otherwise, archive a card.

cards.name: Cyber-Clone

cards.name: Library Card

cards.name: Mind Over Matter
cards.text: Play:  Put each creature into its owner's archives.

cards.name: The Archivist
cards.text:
If you archive The Archivist, archive it faceup.

While The Archivist is in your archives, instead of picking up all your archives, you may choose to pick up any number of cards in your archives.

Reap: Discard a card from your hand.  If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Umbra-Alien
cards.text:
Elusive.
Fight: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck.  Put 1 into your hand and 1 on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Cephaloist
cards.text: While you have 4A or more, your A cannot be stolen.

cards.name: Dæmo-Beast
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Destroyed: Steal 1A.

cards.name: Dark Faerie
cards.text: Skirmish, Fight: Gain 2A

cards.name: Fandangle
cards.text: If you have 4A or more, your non-Untamed creatures enter play ready.

cards.name: Floomf
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Fight: Give a Beast creature two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Gloriana’s Attendant
cards.text: Enhance A A.

cards.name: Keyfrog
cards.text: Destroyed:  Forge a key at current cost.

cards.name: Pismire
cards.text: While there are more friendly Mutant creatures than enemy Mutant creatures, your opponent's keys cost +2A.

cards.name: Rapid Evolution
cards.text: Play: Choose a creature.  Give it a +1 power counter for each A in you have.

cards.name: Reclaimed by Nature
cards.text: Play: Purge an artifact. Resolve its bonus icons as if you had played it.

cards.name: Resurgence
cards.text:
Enhance Draw.
Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand. If that creature is a Mutant, return another creature from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Savage Clash
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature except the most powerful enemy creature and the least powerful friendly creature.

cards.name: Commune
cards.text:
Omega.
Play: Lose all of your A. Gain 4A.

cards.name: Growth Surge
cards.text: Play: Give a flank creature three +1 power counters.  Give its neighbor two +1 power counters.  Give the second creature's other neighbor a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Lumilu
cards.text: Reap: Gain 1A for each other friendly Beast creature.

cards.name: Mushroom with a View
cards.text: Omni: Heal 1 damage from each friendly creature.

cards.name: Trimble
cards.text: Each Mutant creature gains skirmish.

cards.name: Vault's Blessing
cards.text: Play: Each player gains 1A for each Mutant creature they control.

cards.name: Wild Bounty
cards.text:
Enhance A A.
Play: The next time you play a card this turn, resolve each of its bonus icons an additional time.

cards.name: Blossom Drake
cards.text:
Blossom Drake gets +1 power for each artifact in play.
Each artifact's text box is considered blank (except for traits).

cards.name: Dark Queen Gloriana
cards.text:
Enhance A A.
Play: Return a friendly non-Untamed creature to your hand.

cards.name: Look What I Found
cards.text:
Omega.
Play: Return 1 card of each type (action, artifact, creature, upgrade) from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Mercy, Malkin Queen
cards.text:
Skirmish.

After a friendly Cat creature enters play, ward it.

Fight: Ready a friendly Beast creature.

cards.name: Niffle Kong
cards.text:
(Play only with the other half of Niffle Kong.)
Play: Search your deck and discard pile for any number of Niffle creatures, reveal them, and put them into your hand.  Shuffle your deck.
Fight/Reap: You may destroy a friendly Niffle creature. If you do, deal 3D to a creature, steal 1A, and  destroy an enemy artifact.
